sample_campaigns.name: Webinar (Sample)
sample_campaigns.message: Hi, We are scheduling a webinar exclusively to address all the questions a first-timer like you may have. Reply with REGISTER to book your spot!

sample_campaigns.name: Special Offer (Sample)
sample_campaigns.message: Hi, on this Thanksgiving, you can make use of our special 12% off on all add-on services. Offer valid for 3 days. Reply with THANKS to avail the offer, now!

sample_campaigns.name: Happy Birthday (Sample)
sample_campaigns.message: Hey, We would like to wish you a very HAPPY BIRTHDAY from all of us at SMS-Magic. Reply HAPPY to unlock your special gift from us!

sample_incoming_sms.message: Hi, I am not sure, may be you will have to guide me here.

sample_outgoing_history.message: You are now subscribed to receive periodic text messages. Reply HELP for help or STOP to cancel. Msg&data rates may apply.
Hi could you help us with your full name?
Thank you, please help us with your age in numercials. E.g. 32
Thank you again! One of our reps will soon be in touch.
Hi Peter, I am Steve from DEMO Company. I would love to understand what kind of services you are looking for.
Sure! Should we set up a 30 minute call? What time works?
Done, I am setting it up for 3:00 to 3:30.
